name: Assault of the Robots
description: Assault of the Robots is an action game where you will fight across different countries like Germany and Great Britain with different robots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Celeron Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 730 Storage: 100 MB available space
